definitions.title: adj. num. eighth
definitions.body: ;—[[בַּיּוֹם]] [[הַשְּׁמִינִי]] Ex 22:29 + 16 t.; ´[[חַחׂדֶשׁ הַשּׁ]]: 1Ki 6:38 + 4 t.; n.m.om. 1Ch 24:10 + 4 t.; [[הַשָּׁנָח חַשְּׁמִינִת]] Le 25:22; elsewhere only phr., [[עַל־הִשְּׁמִינִית]] 1Ch 15:21, and titles Ps 6:1, Ps 12:1, usu. acc. to the eighth key, or on the octave, but wholly dubious.
